Trade/Device Name(s): Greiner Bio-One MiniCollect Capillary Blood Collection Tubes with dipotassium EDTA (K2EDTA)
Specimen Container(s): MiniCollect Capillary Blood Collection Tube with K2EDTA
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Greiner Bio-One MiniCollect Capillary Blood Collection Tubes with dipotassium EDTA (K2EDTA) for collection and transport of capillary blood for hematology testing
Indications for Use Summary: Designed for collection, transportation and processing of capillary blood (via lancet stick) when a small amount is preferred, and to obtain whole blood for hematology testing
